thread.title: Inside the massive U.S. budget deal

title: Inside the massive U.S. budget deal
text:
Inside the massive U.S. budget deal 2:14pm EST - 02:04 
The sweeping 2-year budget deal that won bipartisan approval this week is a cornucopia of spending - on both national defense and social programs - as well as special interest tax breaks. Andy Sullivan takes a closer look. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The sweeping 2-year budget deal that won bipartisan approval this week is a cornucopia of spending - on both national defense and social programs - as well as special interest tax breaks.
